name: Dye Gather
description:
All my dye is over! And now? How will I finish painting my house? I think my neighbors can help me with this...

I need to get all the dyes to finish painting my house. My new neighbors can help me with this I think, but apparently they need help too.

∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴

The controls are:

W A S D to Move
Space to Interact
ESC to Pause

∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴∵∴

Theme:
Colors and paints

Category:
Anjo Tintas Challenge / Educational

Games Diversifiers:
For Science!: Your game must include science experiments.
Moebius tape: the game plot must start and end at the same point
